title: Headline Marriage Contract - Novel Updates
author: 亦辰
description:
Jiang Yan is a small reporter who is responsible for the 'headlines of the people'. When he was 20 years old, he learned that he was a huge money.

Someone replaced her as a rich family, and someone replaced her as a savior.

The small white flower that occupies the nest of the dragonfly is opposite to each other, and the next-home sister who is a fake wife is a killer. She survives in the cracks.

Fortunately, I met him, and the unfortunate girl was reborn.

She has the same interests as his interests. He decisively shot and asked to go home.

So, with the big man's husband, the small journalist reported that the news, the truth, the public good, the perfect rebellion, the perfect strike of the people.>
